item.title: Making it so u dont lose items when you die in some areas
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Well I use this code in my server and I don’t loose any items.
I give you full permission to copy this.

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { toX = 2399; toY = 5171; inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; sM("Haha! You have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); followID = 0; followID2 = 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so u dont lose items when you die in some areas

item.title: Making it so u dont lose items when you die in some areas
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

I have my boolean but i’m trying to make it so that you don’t lose items in cw

can someone tell me what to edit in this

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInCwgame()) { toX = 2400 + misc.random(3); toY = 9503 + misc.random(3); AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk();

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so u dont lose items when you die in some areas
